pages.text: Habet they est patient dum vos advenit them it est bene pro them! DEUS est Forgiver Merciful
O vos believe wicked person brings any news vos vos primas investigate lest vos commit injustice some people ignorance tunc become sorry remorseful quod vos perfecit

Ac know ut deus messenger advenit tuus midst! Habet he listened to vos multus things vos factus things difficult yourselves! Deus factus vos love faith adorned it tuus hearts He factus vos abhor disbelief wickedness disobedience. These guided unus
Such est gratia DEUS His blessings. DEUS est Omniscient Wise

groups believers fought each alius vos reconcile them. 1 group aggresses alius vos fight aggressing group dum they submit deus command Dodum they submit vos reconcile 2 groups equitably. Vos maintain justice DEUS loves those est just
believers est members de 1 familia; vos keep pax intra tuus familia reverence DEUS ut vos attain mercy

O vos non believe people ridicule alius people they est bene than they! Nor shall any femina ridicule alius femina they est bene than they. Nor shall vos mock unus alias factus fun de tuus cognomen. Malus indeed est reversion to wickedness post attaining faith! Anyone non repent hoc these est transgressors
